author: Mary Meisenzahl
title: A 3D printing company is giving away for free its design for a device that allows doors to be opened handsfree — here's how it works
description: Belgian company Materialise developed a design that can be 3D printed and added to door handles to make them hands-free, and it's giving the design away for free in an effort to fight the spread of coronavirus. The coronavirus outbreak that originated in Chin…
content:
The novel coronavirus can live on some surfaces for as long as three days and has been found on doorknobs, which are touched frequently.
Belgian company Materialise designed 3D printed door openers that attach to a door handle and make it possible to open it… [+468 chars]
